commit message: fix bug, where split transactions could not be cloned
force spinner mode since calendar view does not work inside scroll view
when we change the type of operation we cleanup uncommitted split
upon orientation change, dialogs are recreated automatically
if we do not reset the operation type, contribfeaturerequested is called again if device is rotated
mismatch between error type and message fixed
respect system provided, user preferred date and time formats
fix test: util method needs app context to be set up
